column4: hmm, i guess i'm on my own finding a solution for my monitor powering off when i logout bug. oh well...
I wish I could have been more helpful

An error occurred while loading user interface element local_background_image_chooserbutton from file /usr/share/gdm/gdmsetup.glade.  Possibly the glade interface description was corrupted.. please help
no biggie. i should probably ask on the forum anyway
